alert.note: Alert for Culebra; North Central; San Juan and Vicinity; Vieques (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 05 at 5:18AM ADT until August 05 at 5:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat index values of 108 to 111 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...Bayamon, Carolina, Catano, Guaynabo, San Juan, Toa Alta, Toa Baja, Trujillo Alto, Arecibo, Barceloneta, Dorado, Florida, Manati, Vega Alta, Vega Baja, Culebra, and Vieques. * WHEN...From 11 AM until 4 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is possible with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: A Heat Advisory means that a period of hot temperatures is expected. The combination of hot temperatures and high humidity will combine to create a situation in which heat illnesses are possible. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.

area.areaDesc: Culebra; North Central; San Juan and Vicinity; Vieques
